Row.Text: Ottoman Infantry replacement. +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against other Land Units. All Civilizations’ Settlements suffer a -2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness penalty for every Janissary stationed in or occupying a [icon:CITY_URBAN] District.
